sentences.en: And all along the way, Karl Rove would act as his political right hand man.
sentences.cn: 一路走来, 洛夫就像他的左膀右臂.

sentences.en: Because of Mount Zion , which is desolate - Foxes rove in it.
sentences.cn: 18因为锡安山荒凉,狐狸行在其上.

sentences.en: But how good was Mr Rove at his job?
sentences.cn: 但是罗夫的工作能力到底 如何 ?

sentences.en: But since then Mr Rove's star has been on the wane.
sentences.cn: 但从此之后,罗夫身上的光环开始褪色.

sentences.en: He loved to rove the green hills and clear waters.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢漫游于山青水秀之乡.

sentences.en: He rove hither and thither that night.
I be apt most, rove all over the world , be in a state of blissful abstraction!
sentences.cn: 《再做一次爱》是我原创的小说之一.我的最爱 —— 浪迹天涯, 逍遥自在!

sentences.en: I wander and hesitate , ho , roam and rove in a slow pace.
sentences.cn: 吾踯躅而踌躇兮徘徊而容与 ﹒.

sentences.en: Mr Rove's departure has also set off a debate about his legacy.
sentences.cn: 罗夫的离任也引发了关于其政绩的争论.

sentences.en: My grandfather loved to rove the countryside.
sentences.cn: 我祖父喜欢到乡下走一走.

sentences.en: She sat still for a moment, then her eyes began to rove about the room.
sentences.cn: 她静静地坐了一会儿, 眼睛开始慢慢地扫视房间.

sentences.en: The Clinton - Penn campaign also has some striking similarities to the Bush - Rove campaign of 2000.
sentences.cn: 希拉里-潘恩的选战和2000年布什 - 罗夫的选战之间也惊人地相似.

sentences.en: They have also subpoenaed top presidential aide Karl Rove.
sentences.cn: 他们同时传讯高级总统助理卡尔罗夫.

sentences.en: They stopped near the river and rove stakes for the night.
sentences.cn: 他们在河边停下,支起帐篷过夜.

trans.tran_cn: 穿（绳索），穿过( reeve的过去式和过去分词 )
trans.tran_en: to travel from one place to another

trans.tran_cn: 流浪，漂泊，徘徊，（指眼睛）环顾
